greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A multiplicative encoding (compressed) for the exponents of 2 obtained when using Shevelev's algorithm for computing A002326.
comment: a(n) = A019565(v(1)) * A019565(v(2)) * ... * A019565(v(k)), where v(1) .. v(k) are 2-adic valuations (not all necessarily distinct) of the iterated values obtained when running Shevelev's algorithm for computing A002623. (See A179680 and A292239.)
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1023
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
xref: Cf. A000265, A002326, A007814, A019565, A179680, A292239 (a variant), A292266 (rgs-version of this filter).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2017
